author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Facebook Reassuring Advertisers, Users That Individuals' Personal Data Is Being Protected- WSJ
text:
March 23 (Reuters) -
* FACEBOOK EXECS. ARE REACHING OUT TO ADVERTISING TRADE BODIES, MARKETERS, MAJOR AD AGENCIES TO TELL THEM IT IS WORKING TO AUDIT ALL APPS ON PLATFORM- WSJ
* FACEBOOK IS REASSURING ADVERTISERS AND USERS THAT INDIVIDUALS' PERSONAL DATA IS BEING PROTECTED- WSJ Source text : on.wsj.com/2pDbigr Further company coverage:
